Text:

PS hope you guys enjoyed these
could'nt change the skins, any idea's, appart from that all working 100%
Hey! thanks for upload. this is a very good player for almost everything, but i really miss support for DVD. someone know if there is a way to put in a codec for mpeg4???
I assume this is the trial version?

LOL sorceror  GR8 SEED  Thankx!!!                    BanjoHacket is not to blame if he is a Scarecrow!!  (Borne without a Brain)  LOL                                                                                                                                                Thanks Again!!!

I've been using this player for years and years now. It's the only player I'll use. I've tried others, and for a time, VLC was better for playing all types of video without fail (as a last resort type of thing), but now Zoomplayer has a built in updater that fires up right at installation, which is awesome. This will play ANYTHING, and play it well. FFDshow is the shit, you can tweak the way your movies look till the cows come home. I've tried other players and I always, always end up going back to Zoomplayer. It's just the best damn player there is for Windows. 

If you don't have the updater you can download the trial from the site and then use the updater from that.
tnx for the torrent, works great!!!!

Thanks sorceror. Clean torrent. Works great. :-]

a job well done !

ZP installed clean; everything worked. I didn't use the codec pack (just let ZP's install center do its thing) or the skins - I've stuck with ultra-minimalist by Blight for years.
Thanks.
